TITLE: Utopia (2013)
GENRE: Comedy, Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure, Drama, Made in Europe, Mystery Thriller
DESCRIPTION: The Utopia Experiments is a legendary graphic novel shrouded in mystery. When a group of strangers find themselves in possession of an original manuscript, their lives suddenly and brutally implode.

TITLE: Marvel's Cloak & Dagger (2018)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Drama, Science-Fiction, Young Adult Drama, Superhero
DESCRIPTION: Two teenagers from very different backgrounds awaken to newly acquired superpowers which mysteriously link them to one another.

TITLE: Ahsoka (2023)
DESCRIPTION: Ahsoka Tano was once a Jedi knight trained by Anakin Skywalker. No longer a Jedi, she must now face the wrath of the cruel and cunning officer of the Galactic Empire, Grand Admiral Thrawn. Meanwhile , Dark force users come out of hiding to support the return of an old evil. Order 66 survivor Baylon Skoll and his apprentice Shin Hati are hunting Ahsoka Tano â€“ but the former Jedi is not alone.

TITLE: Fallout (2024)
GENRE: Drama, Science-Fiction, Post Apocalyptic World, Action Adventure
DESCRIPTION: Living in the aftermath of nuclear conflict, the survivors of this shocking event are changed forever. As they emerge from their Vaults they are faced with a flurry of different threats learning as they go that the world of Fallout is far from friendly.

TITLE: Firefly (2002)
GENRE: Science-Fiction, Drama, Action & Adventure, SYFY Drama
DESCRIPTION: Set 500 years in the future, a small crew travels through unchartered territory throughout the galaxy. They must survive constant threats as they face warring factions and try to evade authority agents hunting them down.Firefly was created by Joss Whedon, the sci-fi writer/director known for Buffy the Vampire Slayer and his contributions to the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The show stars Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres and Alan Tudyk.

TITLE: Halo (2022)
GENRE: Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, War & Military, SYFY Military, Action Adventure
DESCRIPTION: In the 26th century, a conflict rages between humans and an alien empire. Known as the Covenant, this theocratic hegemony includes several species who control some areas of the Orion Arm in the Milky Way galaxy. What will it take for humans to prevail?Halo is an adaptation of the popular video game series of the same name. The franchise centers on the war stories of Master Chief Sierra-117, a supersoldier who belongs to the group known as the Spartans. He also has an AI companion called Cortana. In addition to the live action TV series, the video game franchise has also spawned novels, graphic novels, comic books, short films and animated movies â€“ all of which expand upon the gameâ€™s lore.

TITLE: Kingdom (2019)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Period Piece
DESCRIPTION: In this zombie thriller set in Korea's medieval Joseon dynasty, a crown prince is sent on a suicide mission to investigate a mysterious outbreak.

TITLE: Loki (2021)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Superhero
DESCRIPTION: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of "Avengers: Endgame."

TITLE: Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2024)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Spy Thriller
DESCRIPTION: Two lonely strangers land jobs working for a mysterious spy agency that offers them a glorious life of espionage, wealth, world travels, and a dream brownstone in Manhattan. The catch? New identities in an arranged marriage as Mr. and Mrs. John and Jane Smith.

TITLE: Tales from the Loop (2020)
GENRE: Drama, Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Emotional Drama
DESCRIPTION: The townspeople who live above "The Loop," a machine built to unlock and explore the mysteries of the universe, experience things previously consigned to the realm of science fiction.

TITLE: The Boys (2019)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Science-Fiction, Superhero
DESCRIPTION: A group of vigilantes known informally as "The Boys" set out to take down corrupt superheroes with no more than blue-collar grit and a willingness to fight dirty.

TITLE: The Changeling (2023)
DESCRIPTION: A fairytale for grown-ups. A horror story, a parenthood fable and a perilous odyssey through a New York City you didn't know existed.

TITLE: Witcher (2019)
DESCRIPTION: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

TITLE: 3 Body Problem (2024)
DESCRIPTION: A young woman's fateful decision in 1960s China reverberates across space and time to a group of brilliant scientists in the present day. As the laws of nature unravel before their eyes, five former colleagues reunite to confront the greatest threat in humanity's history.

TITLE: American Gods (2017)
DESCRIPTION: An ex-con becomes the traveling partner of a conman who turns out to be one of the older gods trying to recruit troops to battle the upstart deities. Based on Neil Gaiman's fantasy novel.

TITLE: MARVELS Runaways (2017)
DESCRIPTION: Six teenagers discover that their parents are secretly members of a supervillain cabal called The Pride. After deciding they're no longer safe in their own homes, the kids go on the run. In the midst of hiding from their elders, the teens learn about themselves and become a cohesive unit to take down The Pride.

TITLE: SHOGUN (2024)
GENRE: Action & Adventure, Drama, History, War & Military
DESCRIPTION: After a mysterious European ship is found marooned in a nearby fishing village, Lord Yoshii Toranaga discovers secrets that could tip the scales of power and devastate his enemies.

TITLE: THE BEAR (2022)
DESCRIPTION: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

TITLE: True Detective (2014)
DESCRIPTION: An American anthology police detective series utilizing multiple timelines in which investigations seem to unearth personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within or outside the law.

TITLE: Wu-Tang: An American Saga (2019)
DESCRIPTION: In the early 1990s, the formation of the Wu-Tang Clan, one of the most influential hip-hop groups of all time, is portrayed as they dealt with the ongoing crack cocaine epidemic, poverty, and the dangerous streets of Staten Island.

TITLE: American Conspiracy (2024)
DESCRIPTION: When journalist Danny Casolaro was found dead in a hotel bathtub, police ruled it suicide. But his family and friends suspect murder, plunging them into a decades-long quest to uncover the truth about his death and the shadowy conspiracy he believed he uncovered.

TITLE: The Program (2024)
DESCRIPTION: The documentary tracks the rise of a troubled teen industry and specifically Ivy Ridge Academy through the indelible memories of former students, exploring horrific claims of psychological and physical abuse including solitary confinement, sexual misconduct, and manual labor.

TITLE: Wild Wild Country (2018)
DESCRIPTION: When a controversial cult leader builds a utopian city in the Oregon desert, conflict with the locals escalates into a national scandal.

TITLE: You are what you eat (2024)
DESCRIPTION: Identical twins change their diets and lifestyles for eight weeks in a unique scientific experiment designed to explore how certain foods impact the body.
